# Annex III Declaration of Data Protection {-}

Please download and fill out the following declaration of data protection and confidentially agreement for survey administrators and return to info\@act-on-gender.eu 

Download declaration in [PDF](https://geam.act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_GEAMPreLaunch_DataAgr_10SEP2021.pdf), [MS Word](https://geam.act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_GEAMPreLaunch_DataAgr_10SEP2021.docx), or [LibreOffice](https://geam.act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_GEAMPreLaunch_DataAgr_10SEP2021.odt) formats. 

Upon reception, the survey administrators can launch the survey.
